      • createAlphaAnimation

        public static Animator createAlphaAnimation(UIView view,
                            float alpha,
                            long duration,
                            TimeInterpolator interpolator,
                            long delay)
        Construct an animator for inAiR view with destination state of view as alpha
        Parameters:
        view - view will be apply animation
        alpha - destination alpha for view
        duration - duration of animation will be created
        interpolator - the rate of change of an animation
        delay - delay time before transformation being applied
        Returns:
        an android animator

      • createAnimationForView

        public static Animator createAnimationForView(UIView view,
                              float[] transform,
                              float alpha,
                              long duration,
                              TimeInterpolator interpolator,
                              long delay)
        Construct an animator for inAiR view with destination state of view as transform and alpha
        Parameters:
        view - view will be apply animation
        transform - destination transform for view
        alpha - destination alpha for view
        duration - duration of animation will be created
        interpolator - the rate of change of an animation
        delay - delay time before transformation being applied
        Returns:
        an android animator
